review: Absolutely great game. The controls take a bit of getting used to, but after the tutorial/Chapter 1, it's fine. The spell casting mechanic is the best part (obviously, else it wouldn't be called Magicka :P) . I get the feeling 'QF-QF-A-S-S' will be stuck in my brain for a while...
Great game. Would recommend getting the Morrowind Overhaul mod to help the graphics along, but still a great game on it's own.
